CustomApplication.name: CustomApplication
CustomApplication.description: Represents a custom or standard application.

Description.description: The optional description of the application.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the application.

FullName.description: The full name of the application.

IsNavAutoTempTabsDisabled.description: Indicates whether the navigation automatically creates temporary tabs settings. Defaults to false. Available in API version 43.0 and later.

IsNavPersonalizationDisabled.description: Indicates whether navigation personalization is disabled. Defaults to false. Available in API version 43.0 and later.

IsNavTabPersistenceDisabled.description: Indicates whether workspace tabs are cleared for each new console session (true) or not (false). Defaults to false. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

Metadata.description: Provides access to the associated CustomApplication type and related fields in Metadata API.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix of the application.

NavType.description: Not updateable. The type of navigation the application uses. Valid values are: Console Standard

UiType.description: The type of user interface that the application uses. Valid values are: Aloha Lightning

UtilityBar.description: The Lightning page used as the utility bar for the application.

UtilityBarId.description: The ID of the utility bar associated with this application.
